meanings.sent2: The dark alley can scare some people.
meanings.sent3: The prankster tried to scare his friend by jumping out from behind a tree.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected sound of thunder can scare even the bravest of souls.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie was so intense that it could scare anyone.

meanings.definition: A sudden feeling of fear or alarm
meanings.sent1: The loud bang gave me a scare.
meanings.sent2: She let out a little scream in fright at the scare.
meanings.sent3: The scare from the surprise party made her heart race.
meanings.sent4: The sudden appearance of the spider gave her a scare.
meanings.sent5: The scare of being lost in the dark forest was overwhelming.
